Chen.name: Flying Kick
Chen.description: Kick through target enemy, dealing 120 (+4% per level) damage.

Chen.name: Keg Smash
Chen.description: Deal 50 (+4% per level) damage and soak enemies in Brew for 3 seconds, Slowing them by 10%. After 1.25 seconds, the Slow is increased to 40%.  After being used, this ability becomes Breath of Fire.  Breath of Fire Deal damage and Ignite Brew-soaked enemies.

Chen.name: Stagger
Chen.description: Damage taken over the next 3 seconds is prevented.  Once this effect ends, Chen receives 75% of the damage taken over 5 seconds.  This damage cannot be modified.

Chen.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
Chen.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

Chen.name: Wandering Keg
Chen.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

Chen.name: Fortifying Brew
Chen.description: Chen drinks from his keg, gaining 50 Brew and 180 (+4% per level) temporary Shields per second, up to a maximum of 540 (+4% per level) while drinking. Shields persist for 4 seconds after he stops drinking.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Storm
ChenStormEarthFire.description: The spirits gain a Shield for 400 (+4% per level) over 3 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, the shield amount is increased to 750 (+4% per level) with no limited duration, and the duration of Storm, Earth, Fire is increased by 5 seconds.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Earth
ChenStormEarthFire.description: Fire and Earth leap to the target location, dealing 32 (+4% per level) damage and Slowing enemies in a large area by 70% for 1.5 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, increase the damage dealt by 300% and instead of Slowing, the leap Roots enemy Heroes hit for 1.75 seconds.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Fire
ChenStormEarthFire.description: Increase the Attack Speed and Basic Attack damage of the spirits by 50% for 5 seconds.  If this is the final Ability cast, the Attack Speed and damage bonus is increased to 75% and the spirits gain 50% Movement Speed for its duration.

ChenStormEarthFire.name: Breath of Fire
ChenStormEarthFire.description: Breathe a cone of flames, dealing 85 (+4% per level) damage. Enemies that are soaked in Brew are Ignited, dealing 165 (+4% per level) additional damage over 3 seconds and adding 1.5 seconds to the duration of the Slow from Keg Smash.   After being used or after 6 seconds, this ability becomes Keg Smash.  Keg Smash Damage and Slow enemies.

1.name: Eye of the Tiger
1.description: Basic Attacks against Brew-soaked enemy Heroes deal 40% more damage and heal Chen for 40% of the damage done.

1.name: Freshest Ingredients
1.description: Increase the healing duration of Regeneration Globes by 100%.  Quest: Gather 15 Regeneration Globes.  Reward: Reduce Fortifying Brew's cooldown by 1 second, and 50% of its Shield persists indefinitely after drinking.

1.name: Stormstout Secret Recipe
1.description: Chen heals for 3% of his maximum Health when his Basic Abilities hit an enemy Hero.

4.name: Deadly Strike
4.description: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

4.name: Accumulating Flame
4.description: Increase Ignited damage by 20%.  Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes who are Ignited increase its duration by 0.75 seconds.

4.name: Withering Flames
4.description: Igniting an enemy Hero reduces their Spell Power by 50% for 4 seconds.

7.name: Gift of the Ox
7.description: Increase the duration of Stagger's damage prevention by 1 second, and reduce the amount of damage taken over time to 60% of damage taken.

7.name: Brewmaster's Balance
7.description: While at or below 50 Brew, gain 20% Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional 18 (+4% per level) Health per second.

7.name: Elusive Brawler
7.description: Activate to gain 30% Movement Speed and Evade enemy Basic Attacks for 2 seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by 2 seconds.

10.name: Wandering Keg
10.description: Roll around inside an Unstoppable barrel with 70% increased Movement Speed and 25 Armor, dealing 59 (+4% per level) damage to enemies in the way and knocking them back. Lasts for 5 seconds.

10.name: Storm, Earth, Fire
10.description: After 1 second, Chen splits into three elemental spirits for 12 seconds, each with 70% of Chen's maximum Health and a unique Ability.  The last spirit Ability that is cast is empowered. If all three spirits are killed, Chen will die as well.  Storm can grant the spirits a Shield.  Earth can leap to an area and Slow enemies.  Fire can grant the spirits Attack Speed, damage.

13.name: Pressure Point
13.description: Flying Kick Slows the target enemy by 35% for 1 second, or by 70% if Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

13.name: A Touch of Honey
13.description: Increase the Slows from Keg Smash by 15% and its duration by 0.5 seconds.

13.name: Ring of Fire
13.description: After Igniting an enemy, become bathed in a fiery aura, dealing 55 (+4% per level) damage every second to nearby enemies for 5 seconds.

13.name: Enough to Share
13.description: Fortifying Brew instantly grants Chen a Shield that absorbs 180 (+4% per level) damage, and each second grants nearby allied Heroes a Shield that absorbs 140 (+4% per level) damage, up to 420 (+4% per level).

16.name: Flying Leap
16.description: Increase Flying Kick's range by 15% and reduce its cooldown by 0.5 seconds each time an enemy Hero takes damage from being Ignited.

16.name: Celerity
16.description: Basic Attacks against Stunned, Rooted, or Slowed enemy Heroes reduce the cooldown of Stagger by 1.5 seconds and grant Chen 30 Armor for 3 seconds.

16.name: Combo Strikes
16.description: Every 3rd Basic Attack against the same target deals 75% bonus damage.  While Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew and for 2 seconds after, he gains 35% Attack Speed.

20.name: Untapped Potential
20.description: Increase Wandering Keg's Movement Speed bonus from 70% to 125%, and its Armor bonus to 75 for its duration and 3 seconds afterwards.

20.name: Elemental Conduit
20.description: Increase the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and all of their Abilities are empowered.

20.name: Purifying Brew
20.description: Casting Fortifying Brew grants Chen Unstoppable for 1.5 seconds.

20.name: Energizing Brew
20.description: If Chen Channels Fortifying Brew for its full duration, then he gains 20% bonus Health and 20% bonus damage for 25 seconds.
